website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for those with sensitive eyes. Even one coat makes a big difference in color, length, and volume of lashes.

customer_reviews.title: but ill stick to buying it in a store from now on where I know the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: This had to be past the expiration. My eyes got really irritated slowly and then I got a sty or something. Stopped using it to let them heal, tried up again and same thing happened. I've used this brand and type of mascara for years. I will keep using it, but ill stick to buying it in a store from now on where I know the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mulcock

customer_reviews.title: Stays on good
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a problem keeping mascara on, mostly rubs off below bottom lashes. This seems to go on smooth and stays on the best I've found in a long time. I'm over 60 and my skin seems to be changing a lot. I'm buying this as long as it still works on me.
customer_reviews.author: luvharley

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara in hard-to-find waterpoof black/brown
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a brown or brown-black waterproof mascara! I'm so happy to have stumbled across Clinique's. I normally buy Diorshow which costs more and dries out much faster. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and doesn't glob; even when using the first time. I only have to use once a day. Color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. P. Cofield

customer_reviews.title: It didn't go on quite as nicely as the original high impact Clinique but it served ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't go on quite as nicely as the original high impact Clinique but it served its purpose. I didn't look like a raccoon after 12 hours of traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth application, non-clumpy, stays on forever. Plus ...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth application, non-clumpy, stays on forever. Plus one coat makes your lashes look longer and thicker - two coats is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: It applies easily, lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: A lot of mascaras give me red eyes and iritation. This one does not. It applies easily, lasts all day, and makes my lashes longer and fuller. This is my go to mascara. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique High Impact Waterproof Mascara
customer_reviews.text: By far the best Mascara I've ever used. The cost will be a little more for the name brand "Clinique."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn waterproof mascara because my face is oily and my eyes water due to allergies. This product is great! Easy to remove with micellar water for waterproof makeup. After a long day I do find some flakes on my cheeks but no smudges or black under the eyes! I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: You would that for this price this item is waterproof as advertised. Nope. It smears at the slightest touch.
customer_reviews.author: Sancerre Sap

product_meta.title: Clinique High Impact Waterproof Mascara, 02 Black/Brown
product_meta.description: Clinique High Impact Waterproof Mascara, 02 Black/Brown
